name: Path Of Least Resistance
description:
Hi! 

We are glad to introduce you this electricity puzzle for GameOff 2022 Jam!

Path of least resistance is a story about a boy that decided to prepare to exam with a simple way. Challenge yourself by solving electrodynamics puzzles in this story!

How to play:

Elements interaction:

  • Drag and drop from connector to connector with left mouse button to create a cable
  • Drag the ending of the cable and drop it outside the connector to remove a cable
  • Drag the ending of the cable and drop it on another connector to change connection
  • Drag elements with left mouse button to move them
  • Hold elements with left mouse button and use mouse wheel to rotate them.

GameView interaction:

  • Drag the table with left mouse button to move camera
  • Drag the table with right mouse button to change camera angle
  • Use mouse wheel to change zoom.

Our Team: 

Victor Grigorev (Dr-ViJ), Development, https://twitter.com/JustDrViJ, https://github.com/dr-vij

Dmitry Sokolov, Development (https://twitter.com/dsapsan, https://github.com/dsapsan)

Evgeny Truhin, 3D Artist, Modeling (https://www.artstation.com/javaresistance)

Polina Grigoreva - Scenario and Cliche idea

We used Dalle2 outpainting and Midjourney as concept art and characters generator for all 2d comics assets + Dr-ViJ as Junior 2D artist that fixes small things (ha-ha, that one who repairs curly knotty hands made by AI)

So all 2d art was made with Midjourney and Dalle2 and then reworked with procreate.

Circuit Simulation: We decided to port some parts of Paul Falstad's library CircuitJS for this jam

Source Code:

https://github.com/PathOfLeastResistance/PathOfLeastResistance
